name: Bobo and Todd's Excellent Adventure
description: A side-scrolling beat 'em up co-op game, made as a group project by Texas Aggie Game Developers in the fall 2015 semester. Play as the brute Todd, and let your friend join you as the lightweight gunner Bobo, or vice versa, and travel back in time to ancient Egypt to stop the invading Thargarth aliens from changing history.
